snippet.title: Blood Reaver Pre-Alpha Gameplay Trailer (2024)
snippet.description:
Blood Reaver is a Dark Fantasy, Co-op, Wave-based, FPS where 4 unlikely heroes must restore an ancient order, harnessing the powers of blood magic to stop a demonic invasion sent by the gods of hell - reigniting a timeless war where the fate of their world hangs in the balance.

Wishlist on Steam || https://bit.ly/3U4e4d3

Join the Cult || https://discord.gg/q9edUugfTF

Developed By Hell Byte Studios, Published by Freedom Games.
